author: Defold
description: Web Monetization is a JavaScript browser API which allows the creation of a payment stream from the user agent to the website. This extension allows game developers to detect if a player has an active payment stream or not and offer additional content or perks to paying players.
name: WebMonetization

releases.message: CHANGE: This version works on Defold 1.8.0 and above
CHANGE: This version works on Defold 1.4.0 and above
BREAKING CHANGE: Updated to support latest version of Emscripten. Requires Defold 1.2.178

NEW: The event listener now also returns the event details. Example:

```
webmonetization.set_listener(function(self, event, details)
    pprint(details)
end)
```
